modShortDescription: Trash bags and junk piles will destroy when you loot them instead of lingering around. Do not use this with the Bird Nest and Trash Pile Destroy mod.
modDescription:
Trash bags and junk piles will destroy when you loot them instead of lingering around. Do not use this with the [Bird Nest and Trash Pile Destroy](https://7daystodiemods.com/birds-nest-and-trash-bag-destroy-upon-loot/) mod as it is already included.

**[Download](https://yehonal.github.io/DownGit/#/home?url=https://github.com/JaxTeller718/A19ModletsJax/tree/a19b168/JaxTeller718_TrashDestroyOnLoot)**
